newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippines raises special Treasury bill rates.
newsitem.headline: Philippines raises special Treasury bill rates.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank said on Tuesday it had increased the rates of its special series Treasury bills by 20 basis points.
The rates of 78-day and 85-day T-bills were both raised to 11.2 percent from 11.0 percent.
The rate adjustment came a day after the 91-day benchmark rate went up to 11.536 percent from 11.33 percent registered last week. - Manila newsroom 63 2 8418938 Fax 8176267
